pages.name: Hint #3
pages.text: From ghostly seeds, a pumpkin pale. In moonlit fields, its color frail. Carve with care, then light the way. For spirits lost, may find their way.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #3
pages.text: Craft white pumpkin seeds, grow a white pumpkin, carve the pumpkin with shears, and then craft a lit white Jack o' Lantern.

pages.title: Answer #3
pages.text: White pumpkins are normally found in the pale garden, but this crafting recipe will let you craft them without experimental features enabled.$(br)
